R

randomExchange(Equipment) - Method in class logic.Player
The method will be called by a NPC.
read(String) - Static method in class persistence.CampaignFileManager
this method is to read files of Campaign
read(String) - Static method in class persistence.EquipmentFileManager
this method is to read file to create a equipment
read(String) - Static method in class persistence.MapFileManager
this method is to read files of map
read() - Method in class persistence.MapFileManagerTest
This method is for testing if the map can be got from a json file, if yes, then the cell inside the map can be reached, too.
read(String) - Static method in class persistence.PlayerFileManager
this method is to read files of Player
ReadyScene - Class in ui.scene
This ReadyScene means players have already created a play within onPlayer and campaign.
ReadyScene() - Constructor for class ui.scene.ReadyScene
 
refreshChest() - Method in class logic.Play
This method is used for removing chest when it is empty.
refreshContent() - Method in class ui.view.GameMapView
This method refreshes the Content layer when it occurs some event on that, for example, add a new cell view, remove a cell view, or move a cell view, etc.
refreshHighlight() - Method in class ui.view.GameMapView
This method refreshes HighlightLayer.
refreshMapView() - Method in class ui.scene.MapEditingScene
The method is used to refresh MapView.
refreshPlayer() - Method in class logic.Play
This method is used for removing dead onPlayer when his inventory is empty.
remove(Component) - Method in class ui.view.View
This method overrides the remove() method in JPanel class
removeAllCells() - Method in class ui.view.GameMapLayerView
This function is to clear the whole GameMapViewLayer in order to add new items on that
removeCell(Point) - Method in class logic.GameMap
this method is to remove cell
removeCell(Point) - Method in class ui.view.GameMapLayerView
This method is to remove a cell from GameMapView
removeMapName(int) - Method in class logic.Campaign
this method is to remove the name of maps
resolveMap() - Method in class logic.Play
This is the method for get currentMap, and add onPlayer into the map(enter).
RING - Static variable in class logic.Equipment
 
rool(int) - Static method in class logic.Dice
This method is used to generate the dice result for once, only based on the dice.
rool(int, int) - Static method in class logic.Dice
This method is used to generate the dice result for once, based on the dice and also the dice modifier.
rool(int, int, int) - Static method in class logic.Dice
This method is used to generate the dice result for several times.
